definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: The World Bank is the largest single international funding source for biodiversity projects.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行是生物多樣性項目的最大單個國際資金來源。

sentences.english: The World Bank's full name is the International Bank for Reco truction and Development.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行的全稱是國際復興與開發銀行。

sentences.english: A substantial part of your client base is the back office of the worldwide bank.
sentences.chinese: 你的一個人員下屬機構是世界銀行的後勤處。

sentences.english: The World Bank stands ready to provide assistance to these efforts.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行隨時準備爲這些工作提供援助。

sentences.english: I believe your second question is, what can the World Bank do?
sentences.chinese: 我想您的第二個問題是世界銀行能夠做什麼？

sentences.english: How can the World Bank Group support and facilitate your investments in Africa?
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行集團如何支持和促進在非洲的投資？

sentences.english: Sri Mulyani Indrawati is Managing Director of the World Bank Group and a former finance minister of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行集團常務董事，曾任印尼財政部長。

sentences.english: Also my, um, my father used to work for the World Bank and
sentences.chinese: 而且，我的父親之前在世界銀行工作。

sentences.english: He has also held positions at Salomon Brothers Inc. and the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 他也曾在所羅門兄弟公司和世界銀行就職。

sentences.english: The World Bank's Mr Hoekman is more optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行的Hoekman先生更加樂觀。

sentences.english: How is the World Bank coordinating with other organizations to respond to this emergency?
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行如何與其他組織協調來應對這種緊急事態？

sentences.english: Charlie also served as consultant for the World Bank and for Taiwan's National Science Council.
sentences.chinese: 謝博士還曾是世界銀行和臺灣國家科學理事會的顧問。

sentences.english: The World Bank is accusing Israel of stifling the Palestinian economy.
sentences.chinese: 世界銀行指責以色列窒息巴勒斯坦的經濟。

sentences.english: This will no longer be your grandparents’ World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 這將不再是祖父輩的世界銀行。

sentences.english: The change will make China the third largest shareholder at the Bank.
sentences.chinese: 投票權增加後，中國將成爲世界銀行的第三大股東國。

sentences.english: How do I contact the World Bank?
sentences.chinese: 我怎樣與世界銀行取得聯繫？

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Jing1 ji4 Lun4 tan2

definition: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development, OECD/abbr. for 經濟合作與發展組織|经济合作与发展组织
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)
UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: Asian area/the Far East/Asia Pacific region
